Description_lang: On taking a potential deathblow, you become encased in a block of amber, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for $d.While encased, the amber's healing properties reduce damage taken by $s1% and regenerate $s3% of the your total health and mana every $t4 sec. During that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells.
AuraDescription_lang: While encased in amber, reduce damage taken by $s1% and gain $s3% of total mana $?$w5=0[][and $w5% of total health ]every $t4 sec for $d. Cannot attack, move or use spells.
